p: CHIKV has a worldwide geographic distribution. Phylogenetic analyses reveal the presence of four lineages: West African (WAf), East/Central/South African (ECSA), Indian Ocean (IOL) and Asian. While all lineages are capable of causing human infection, viruses that comprise the IOL (subset of ECSA) and Asian lineages are more associated with large epidemics. Regardless, there is serologic recognition between lineages such that infection (or vaccination) with one lineage can protect against another [ 203].
